content: this legal text provides a summary of the progress made in a specific case over a period of 27 days the case involves parties referred to as ms n ms c r ms c l and mr c g the parties reached a mediation agreement regarding the division of an inheritance ms n ms c r and ms c l sold their shares of certain properties to mr c g for a sum of 45000 the final deed would be executed by a notary public on july 30 2023 the parties also agreed that there would be no further claims regarding a loan mediation fees were paid by mr c g the conciliatory agreement would be subject to registration tax the proceedings were closed by the designated mediator and the parties were responsible for paying the remaining mediation fees
